title: Ping spikes while playing League.
body:
Normally when I'm doing anything else my ping spikes up to about 1000 but they  aren't frequent and they don't last very long (3 seconds at most)

When I play League (Restarted playing it this month) it can spike up to 68 thousand (Other records being 57 thousand, 33 thousand and 19 thousand all happened this week in League). 

This did not happen 4 months ago when I last played League and nothing changed to my internet or anything involving my internet.

replies.body:
Most latency (ping) issues such as this are caused by poor ISP routing to the servers. Before we take a look at your specific routing, I'd like you to confirm your local network settings are configured to the specs listed in our [network guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to have high latency after working through those steps.
